    private final int id;
    private final int sidebar;
    
    private Spellbook(int id, int sidebar) {
        this.id = id;
        this.sidebar = sidebar;
    }
    
    public int getIndex() {
        return id;
    }
    
    public int getInterfaceIndex() {
        return sidebar;
    }
